item.title: Monique add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A big leather-bound volume makes an ideal razorstrap. A thing book is useful to stick under a table with a broken caster to steady it. A large, flat atlas can be used to cover a window with a broken pane. And a thick, old-fashioned heavy book with a clasp is the finest thing in the world to throw at a noisy cat." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Monique add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "THE EDGE, there is no honest way to explain it because the only people who really know where it is are the ones who have gone over." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Monique add a quote by Sri T. Krishnamacharya
item.description: "Why do we need money beyond a point? If we are free of ill health, enmity, and debt, is that not enough? Too much money only leads to less peace." -- Sri T. Krishnamacharya

item.title: Monique add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "He never went out without a book under his arm, and he often came back with two." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Monique add a quote by Jay-Z
item.description: "I'm not a businessman, I'm a business, man!" -- Jay-Z
